item.title: Flowhub
item.description:
Flowhub

Peer-to-peer full-stack visual programming for your fingers. Funded by Kickstarter, from the NoFlo team. www.flowhub.io

item.title: Full-Stack Flow-Based Programming
item.description:
Full-Stack Flow-Based Programming

The idea of Full-Stack Development is quite popular at the moment â€” building things that run both the browser and the server side of web development, usually utilizing similar languages and frameworks. With Flow-Based Programming and the emerging Flowhub ecosystem, we can take this even further. Thanks to the FBP network protocol we can build and monitor graphs spanning multiple devices and flow-based environments.

item.title: PIKSEL 2013: MicroFlo, visual programming for microcontrollers (Arduino)
item.description:
PIKSEL 2013: MicroFlo, visual programming for microcontrollers (Arduino)

Presented at the Piksel festival in Bergen, http://13.piksel.no/ Video cut out from http://bambuser.com/v/4122524#t=13507s, recorded by Pixelache Helsinki http://www.pixelache.ac/

item.title: Flowhub
item.description:
Flowhub

Peer-to-peer full-stack visual programming for your fingers. Funded by Kickstarter, from the NoFlo team. www.flowhub.io

item.title: MicroFlo 0.1.0, and an Arduino powered fridge
item.description:
MicroFlo 0.1.0, and an Arduino powered fridge

Lately I've been playing with microcontrollers again; Atmel AVRs with and without Arduino boards. I've make a couple of tiny projects myself, helped an artist friend do interactive works and helped to integrated a microcontroller it in an embedded product at work.

item.title: Leo Zovic briefly introduces noflo -- Toronto FBP Meeting 1, Part 3
item.description:
Leo Zovic briefly introduces noflo -- Toronto FBP Meeting 1, Part 3

More information available here: http://noflojs.org/ My wife tells me I'm not actually as fat as I look here. I do really sound like that though. -_-

item.title: Flying a Quadrocopter with NoFlo
item.description:
Flying a Quadrocopter with NoFlo

This will obviously be more interesting when we have the rest of the motion commands implemented, and can start reading the output of the various sensors on the drone to make it react to its environment.

item.title: Flow-Based Programming is Why I am an Engineer
item.description:
Flow-Based Programming is Why I am an Engineer

Talk by Dan Lynch, CTO of Brandcast (https://brandcast.com) at the Future of Software Design SF Meetup http://www.meetup.com/the-future-of-software-design-sf/events/133698162/

item.title: Introduction to Flow-Based Programming and NoFlo
item.description:
Introduction to Flow-Based Programming and NoFlo

Talk by Henri Bergius at the c-base hackerspace in Berlin. See http://noflojs.org for more details!
